    @allure.title(
        "Test to verify that the Create Object Task Actions works as expected at the start of the task")

    @pytest.mark.scenario

    @pytest.mark.create_object_task_action_triggered_at_start_of_task

                                                              ("user_group", [])])
    def test_create_object_task_action_triggered_at_start_of_task(self, user_group_creation, job_execution_by,
                                                                  users_list):
        process_data = self.process_obj.test_add_create_object_action_type()
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
    
        self.job_obj.start_job()
